attributes.action: Stay in the EU, based upon a nation's democratic right to change its mind.
attributes.additional_details: Faced with economic uncertainty, and the likelihood of recession, as one nation we support MP's from all parties in overturning the referendum and remaining in the EU, from a new enlightened perspective, by the people, for the people, for our immediate economic well-being, for our children and their future, and to save our nation from the negative effects already unfolding before us. We welcome people of all parties, all races, all religions, for the good which unites us as one sovereign nation.
attributes.background: Upon seeing the hitherto hidden realities, such as restricted access to the single market, the chancellor's statement of a raise in taxes, a prediction of at least a two year slump in the building industry, many people are now better informed as to make an enlightened decision to remain in the EU
